summary: Diana arrives in a town to start a new job. She's threatened into working as an exotic dancer. She's later kidnapped and let loose naked in the wilderness as prey for the psycho hunter, like many women before her. Will she survive?
cast: Sonja Runar|Ronald Dunas|Arron Shiver|J.D. Garfield|Robyn Reede|Kalila Ceccarelli|Danielle De Luca|Mel MacKaron|Jenny Marlowe|Rhett Lynch|Lisa Hill|Lourdez Gonzales|Ruben Garcia|Rima Miller|Kate Vasquez-Eberhardt|Derek Watson|Kevin Wiggins|Evan Adrian|Brian McCallister|Kevin R. Elder|Matt Sanford|Bruce Hammond|Joe Mantegna|Cynthia Straus|John J. Turner|Dennis E. Garber|Lisa Bonanno|Edward Wallace|Larry Watts|Clark Sanchez|John H. Euber|Cynthia Marie Hruschka|John Macho|Sara Roybal|Brian C. Schilling|J. Nathan Simmons|Jay Winton
title: Naked Fear
